custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AV-Handles
custom_nodes.description:
Audio/Video handle management for ComfyUI workflows
Add and remove stabilization frames with synchronized audio for video diffusion models.

custom_nodes.author: tritant
custom_nodes.title: SuperScaler
custom_nodes.description: An all-in-one, multi-pass generative upscaling and post-processing node designed to simplify complex workflows and add a professional finish to your images.

custom_nodes.author: EuphoricPenguin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Resemble Enhance
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for audio enhancement using Resemble AI's Resemble Enhance model. Created using OpenHands, Cline, and DeepSeek.

custom_nodes.author: Rathius-Saranoth
custom_nodes.title: Rathius ComfyUI Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI by Rathius

custom_nodes.author: MartinDeanMoriarty
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NumberToText
custom_nodes.description: Converts a number (e.g., 2 or 15) into written text (e.g., two or fifteen). Works for english and german up to numbers as high as 9999 without problems.

custom_nodes.author: vantagewithai
custom_nodes.title: Vantage-DyPE
custom_nodes.description: Vantage DyPE integrates DyPE (Dynamic Position Extrapolation) into ComfyUI, enabling Flux-based transformer models to produce native ultra-high-resolution images (4K, 8K, and beyond) without retraining or external upscaling.

custom_nodes.author: Starnodes2024
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Star DyPE
custom_nodes.description:
Dynamic Position Extrapolation for Ultra High Resolution FLUX Image Generation
This custom node enables FLUX models in ComfyUI to generate ultra-high resolution images (4K and beyond) using DyPE (Dynamic Position Extrapolation) technology.

custom_nodes.author: ardadmrknn
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt History Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that automatically saves your prompts, generated images, and workflow metadata into a browsable history, accessible directly from the node.

custom_nodes.author: wizdroid
custom_nodes.title: Wizdroid Character Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI that provide AI-powered prompt generation tools using Ollama. These nodes help create detailed, professional prompts for text-to-image generation across various domains including character creation, fashion, fantasy scenes, and image analysis.

custom_nodes.author: fuselayer
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-minimal-workflow-image
custom_nodes.description: Fixed implementation of the export workflow image utility from [a/pythongosssss/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts](https://github.com/pythongosssss/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts). All nodes should display and all node links should be visible and render 1:1 to their actual states in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: fchangjun
custom_nodes.title: BaiduMeux_Comfy Tools
custom_nodes.description: Meux ComfyTools is a collection of custom nodes that streamline common workflow chores in ComfyUI for the Meux asset platform.

custom_nodes.author: HM-RunningHub
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_RH_VideoAsPrompt
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates Video-As-Prompt for motion-guided video generation from image inputs.

custom_nodes.author: SquirrelRat
custom_nodes.title: WanVideoLooper
custom_nodes.description: This is a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI designed for generating sequential long video clips based on the Wan 2.2 model architecture, handling continuity between segments and offering advanced control over the sampling process

custom_nodes.author: FranckyB
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Prompt-Manager

custom_nodes.description: Clean workflow routing nodes for ComfyUI. Say goodbye to spaghetti connections!

custom_nodes.description: Pass string and images between multiple ComfyUI via socket. Easy and intuitive nodes for remote connection.

custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension that allows you to find and locate nodes by their ID, title, pack, or type in complex workflows.

custom_nodes.author: loockluo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI WhisperX Pro

custom_nodes.description: Offline translation node for ComfyUI, powered by Facebook's M2M-100 multilingual model. Translate text between 100+ languages — completely offline and private.

custom_nodes.author: flybirdxx
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SoulX-Podcast
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-SoulX-Podcast is a custom node plugin for ComfyUI that packages the core functionality of SoulX-Podcast (long-form, multi-speaker, multi-dialect podcast voice generation) into a visual node workflow.

custom_nodes.author: eRepublik-Labs
custom_nodes.title: ERPK Collection
custom_nodes.description: A monorepo for ERPK's custom ComfyUI nodes, extending ComfyUI's functionality through integrations with various AI services and APIs.

custom_nodes.author: weekii
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GGUF-FX
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for running GGUF quantized Qwen2.5-VL models using llama.cpp

custom_nodes.author: Aishor

custom_nodes.author: ModelTC

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-LightVAE is a collection of LightX2V VAE custom nodes designed for ComfyUI, supporting high-performance video VAE models including LightVAE and LightTAE.

custom_nodes.author: koirpraw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI GCP Cloud Storage Integration
custom_nodes.description: This custom node package provides seamless integration between ComfyUI and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Cloud Storage, enabling you to run ComfyUI without relying on instance disk storage. decouple your storage needs from local disks by leveraging GCP's scalable and reliable Cloud Storage service. Models can be saved and loaded directly from Cloud Storage, while outputs and temporary files are automatically synced.

custom_nodes.author: wildminder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DyPE
custom_nodes.description: DyPE for FLUX. Artifact-free 4K+ image generation.

custom_nodes.author: yeeyou
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OpenAI Compatible API Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that supports OpenAI-compatible APIs, allowing it to call any large-language-model service compatible with the OpenAI API format (such as vLLM, LM Studio, Ollama, LocalAI, etc.).

custom_nodes.author: heyburns
custom_nodes.title: Image Chooser Classic
custom_nodes.description: A modern re-implementation of the classic [a/cg-image-picker](https://github.com/chrisgoringe/cg-image-picker) ComfyUI nodes. Keep the workflow-pausing image selection experience while shedding the legacy compatibility shims.

custom_nodes.author: ussoewwin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-QwenImageLoraLoader
custom_nodes.description: Standalone ComfyUI custom node for Nunchaku QwenImage LoRA loading functionality.

custom_nodes.author: rsxdalv
custom_nodes.title: TTS WebUI API nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description:
Nodes: TTS WebUI Kokoro, TTS WebUI Chatterbox, TTS WebUI StyleTTS2, TTS WebUI Kitten TTS, TTS WebUI F5-TTS, TTS WebUI Preset
Add API key to environment variable 'TTS_WEBUI_OPENAI_API_KEY'
Alternatively you can write your API key to file 'tts_api_key.txt'
You can also use and/or override the above by entering your API key in the 'api_key' field of each node.

custom_nodes.author: djdarcy
custom_nodes.title: Smart Resolution Calculator
custom_nodes.description: Flexible resolution and latent generation for ComfyUI with toggle-based dimension inputs and automatic calculation of missing values

custom_nodes.author: yannickcruz
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI YSC HighRes-Fix
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI designed to simplify the 'High-Resolution Fix' process. This node takes an input image, performs a direct upscale, and then re-encodes it into a latent image, preparing it for a final sampling pass to add details.

custom_nodes.author: GeekatplayStudio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI HiTem3D Integration
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive ComfyUI node collection that integrates with the HiTem3D API to generate high-quality 3D models from images, featuring advanced HTML preview capabilities and dynamic content generation.

custom_nodes.author: abdullahceylan

custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node for optimizing and compressing images with support for multiple formats (JPEG, WebP, PNG) and configurable quality settings.

custom_nodes.author: Windecay
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_CheckVprediction
custom_nodes.description: A simple node for detecting vrediction, outputs a boolean value, used for logical switching (for example, automatically adding rescalecfg when vrediction model is detected), recommended to be used with if else and other nodes.

custom_nodes.author: eddyhhlure1Eddy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TorchCompileSpeed

custom_nodes.author: Dehypnotic
custom_nodes.title: Dehypnotic Save nodes
custom_nodes.description: Save toolkit for audio, image, and video: MP3 audio export with VBR/CBR options, multi-format image saving with workflow/thumbnail metadata, and video + frame encoding (MP4/MKV/WEBM/MOV) — all sharing whitelist-safe paths and rich placeholder templating.

custom_nodes.description: Automatic image tagging using WD14 models with batch processing and GPU acceleration for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.description: Bilibili IndexTTS2 ComfyUI Version - Auto-downloads models, simple to use.

custom_nodes.description: Generate high-fidelity 360-degree panoramic images using the DiT360 diffusion transformer model in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.description: Some useful nodes for ComfyUI (model loader & extensions for EBU-LMStudio)

custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI extension that enables seamless integration with AWS S3 storage for reading and saving images directly within your ComfyUI workflows. custom_nodes.description: This nodepack lets you use several Replicate models for image generation and editing: Qwen Image Edit Plus (Multi-Image) for editing multiple images using reference poses, Qwen Image Edit (Single Image) for single-image edits with text instructions, SeedEdit 3.0 (ByteDance) for advanced prompt-controlled editing, and Seedream 4.0 (ByteDance) for high-quality multi-resolution image generation.
